channel.title: Yeah I need some help with this
channel.description: Let's say my server ip is server.no-ip.org, and the old server ip is oldserver.no-ip.org. Well I have checked every file in my source and I changed the Ip in my client, but I can't seem to connect because it is still working on oldserver.no-ip.org. I did find this, [code]connectingHost.startsWith("server2"))[/code]

item.title: Yeah I need some help with this
item.dc:creator: @N11 -N-
item.description:
@N11 wrote:

Let’s say my server ip is server.no-ip.org, and the old server ip is oldserver.no-ip.org. Well I have checked every file in my source and I changed the Ip in my client, but I can’t seem to connect because it is still working on oldserver.no-ip.org. I did find this,

connectingHost.startsWith("server2"))

Read full topic
item.source: Yeah I need some help with this
